channel.title: Radio button and midi cc
channel.description: Hi! I' m pretty new here and I don't know if this issue has already been considered. I want to midi cc an i radio n button with my doepfer drehbank. When I begin to turn the assigned cc pot of the DB the radio button suddenly goes to the maximum value. I suppose that the button changes maybe at 1, 2,3... etc values of the controller. In my opinion the button should change his state at 128/n value of the controller, so the range of the knob is divided in exactly n parts (like i. e. in the nord modular G2). Is there a workaround of this issue?

item.title: Radio button and midi cc
item.dc:creator: @patatos angelo avogadri
item.description:
@patatos wrote:

Hi!
I' m pretty new here and I don't know if this issue has already been considered. I want to midi cc an i radio n button with my doepfer drehbank. When I begin to turn the assigned cc pot of the DB the radio button suddenly goes to the maximum value. I suppose that the button changes maybe at 1, 2,3... etc values of the controller. In my opinion the button should change his state at 128/n value of the controller, so the range of the knob is divided in exactly n parts (like i. e. in the nord modular G2). Is there a workaround of this issue?
